home-description: A full stack developer from Brazil.
about-content:
I'm a full stack web developer with over two years of experience using several tools such as React, Vue, Graphql and many others. To build software that helps people grow their busines.

I'm currently working with Vue and GraphQL and studying PHP.

Down below you can see some of the technologies I use as well as some of the projects I've worked.

You can also find me on the social networks listed below.
